RT @zerowasteeurope: At the 7th REUSE Conference @jmaillotzwe on the biggest barriers to reuse: 

- Lack of economic incentives 
- Small re‚Ä¶
retweet_text:
At the 7th REUSE Conference @jmaillotzwe on the biggest barriers to reuse: 

- Lack of economic incentives 
- Small responsibility on producers

Strong EPR schemes with fee modulation could help changing the game.
